document.masterDocTitle: A new species of Anilios (Scolecophidia: Typhlopidae) from Central Australia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new species of Anilios (Scolecophidia: Typhlopidae) from Central Australia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species,
A. australis
Gray, 1845
, by subsequent designation (
Stejneger 1904 : 683
), see
Savage and Boundy ( 2012 )
and
Wallach and Glaw ( 2009 )
. Type designation reiterated by
Stejneger ( 1907 )
and
Cochran ( 1941 )
.
